item.title: Mixin in Java
item.description: 什么是Mixin 维基百科的解释是： In object-oriented programming languages, a mixin is a class that contains methods for use by other classes without having to be the parent class of those other classes. How those other classes gain access to the mixin’s methods depends on the language. Mixins are sometimes described as being “included” rather than “inherited”. 简

item.title: 如何利用Linux命令简单加密文本
